title: bAla daNDAyudan
sahitya:
bAla daNDAyudan pOl anukUlan uNDO jnAlam koNDADiDum jnAna paNDitanAna


anupallavi

  hAlamuNDOn bAlan Anai mukhanukkiLaiyan kOlamayil vAhanan kOdai vaLLi mOhanan


caraNam    aLLi salikAdaruLai aLikkum vaLLal uLLam urugi bhaktarai uyya sheyyum ayyan 
eLLi naghaiyADit-tannai ediritta paghai sUranai puLLi mayilAkki nighar illA sirippeidiya
